front.title: Security Mechanisms for Version 1 of the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMPv1)

abstract.t: One of the primary concerns with SNMPv1 is the lack of security. It is the purpose of this memo, Security Mechanisms for SNMPv1, to define a compatible method of adding authentication and privacy functions to the SNMPv1 framework. This memo is applicable to SNMPv1 and should be applicable to any other SNMP framework that uses similar community name based authentication and packet structure as SNMPv1.
